subject: Making it possible to override always having empty folders deleted.
commitMessage:
Making it possible to override always having empty folders deleted.

With the new API function media_folder_auto_delete_empty_set().

Change-Id: I6eea3546d1db3172272f72a3c792873aa5c6cf57
Signed-off-by: Gustavo Lima Chaves <gustavo.lima.chaves@intel.com>

commitMessage:

subject: Make media_album_get_album_from_db() fill in the 'album_art_path' field.
commitMessage:
Make media_album_get_album_from_db() fill in the 'album_art_path' field.

That field was missing, now fixed.

Change-Id: I8d98257c7adec11ba8a22154bcc9ec35fca5d76c
Signed-off-by: Gustavo Lima Chaves <gustavo.lima.chaves@intel.com>

subject: Introducing the new field -- 'tag_time' -- in tag_map table.
commitMessage:
Introducing the new field -- 'tag_time' -- in tag_map table.

This will record the time at which a given media entry was tagged. A
proper table field macro was created for it. SELECT_MEDIA_FROM_TAG, a
query that is used by media_tag_foreach_media_from_db(), was changed
in order to expose the tag field to the user now, so that she can
apply filters (such as order by) on it.

Change-Id: I8972fa68d1caffbec2289fc44c141d64fcd3e886
Signed-off-by: Gustavo Lima Chaves <gustavo.lima.chaves@intel.com>

subject: Using ',' as a separator for SQL 'order by' fields.
commitMessage:
Using ',' as a separator for SQL 'order by' fields.

When doing a SQL select with several order by fields, we should
separate them using commas.

Change-Id: I979b6f00a435aeb90d42f46d38f9c45fd845d6a6
Signed-off-by: Gustavo Lima Chaves <gustavo.lima.chaves@intel.com>

subject: Fixing SELECT_FOLDER_LIST{,_WITH_EMPTY} uses *with conditions*.
commitMessage:
Fixing SELECT_FOLDER_LIST{,_WITH_EMPTY} uses *with conditions*.

Apparently noone was using them that way until now. By adding 'where
1' on their ends, we make them like others in the code and avoid
crashes.

Change-Id: I82dcef83689199a4ec8593af60901facbe3aa62c
Signed-off-by: Gustavo Lima Chaves <gustavo.lima.chaves@intel.com>
